fields.name: Web Development
fields.description: Everything related to frontend and backend development.

fields.name: Frontend
fields.description: Technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js, Angular.

fields.name: Backend
fields.description: Technologies like Node.js, Django, Flask, FastAPI, Express.js, NestJS.

fields.name: Full Stack
fields.description: Combination of frontend and backend development.

fields.name: Databases
fields.description: SQL, NoSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis.

fields.name: APIs and Web Services
fields.description: REST, GraphQL, WebSockets, OpenAPI.

fields.name: DevOps and Cloud
fields.description: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Google Cloud, Azure.

fields.name: Cybersecurity
fields.description: Web security, common attacks, encryption, ethical hacking.

fields.name: Artificial Intelligence
fields.description: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision.

fields.name: Data Science and Big Data
fields.description: Data analysis, Pandas, NumPy, Spark, Hadoop.

fields.name: Software Architecture
fields.description: Design patterns, DDD, Microservices, Monoliths.

fields.name: Testing and QA
fields.description: Unit testing, integration, Jest, Cypress, Pytest.

fields.name: Operating Systems
fields.description: Linux, Windows, MacOS, Kernel, Bash, Shell Scripting.

fields.name: Blockchain and Web3
fields.description: Smart Contracts, Ethereum, Solidity, NFT, DeFi.

fields.name: Real-Time Programming
fields.description: WebSockets, WebRTC, Edge Computing.

fields.name: Functional Programming
fields.description: Functional paradigm, languages like Haskell, Elixir, Scala.

fields.name: Mobile Development
fields.description: Android, iOS, Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin.

fields.name: Algorithms and Data Structures
fields.description: Sorting, Recursion, Dynamic Programming, Trees, Graphs.

fields.name: Quantum Computing
fields.description: Qubit, Quantum Algorithms, Quantum Simulation.

fields.name: Internet of Things (IoT)
fields.description: Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Sensors, MQTT.

fields.name: AI Agents y LLMs
fields.description: Agentes autónomos, LLMs como GPT, LangChain, ReAct, AutoGPT, BabyAGI.

fields.name: Automatización con IA
fields.description: RPA, bots inteligentes, workflows autónomos, IA aplicada a negocios.

fields.name: Integraciones Low-Code/No-Code
fields.description: Plataformas como Make, n8n, Zapier, y automatización sin código.

fields.name: Voice AI y Audio Agents
fields.description: Conversión de texto a voz, Whisper, Retell, ElevenLabs, control por voz.

fields.name: Machine Learning Operations (MLOps)
fields.description: Producción de modelos ML, seguimiento, pipelines, versiones y monitoreo.

fields.name: Multimodal AI
fields.description: Combinación de texto, imágenes, audio y video en modelos de IA.

fields.name: Plataformas de IA
fields.description: Relevance AI, Retell, OpenAI, Hugging Face, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity.

fields.name: Chatbots y Asistentes Virtuales
fields.description: Diseño e implementación de asistentes conversacionales inteligentes.
